name: Rubrik
description: This plugin is used to push IOCs of type MD5, and SHA256 to the Threat Hunt page, and doesn't support pulling of IOCs from Rubrik. This plugin supports performing 'Start Threat Hunt' action.

configuration.label: Base URL
configuration.description: Base URL of your Rubrik instance - e.g. https://rubrik01.rubrikdemo.com

configuration.label: Client ID
configuration.description: Client ID generated from the Rubrik platform. To obtain the Client ID, a Service Account JSON needs to be generated. Navigate to Apps > Settings > Users and Access to generate it.

configuration.label: Client Secret
configuration.description: Client Secret generated from the Rubrik platform. To obtain the Client Secret, a Service Account JSON needs to be generated. Navigate to Apps > Settings > Users and Access to generate it.
